# 데이터 과학 제품/서비스 생산공장

## 석유

원유를 정제하게 되면 

![](fig/data-economy-industry.png)


```{r oil-refine}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(ggtext)
library(emo) # devtools::install_github("hadley/emo")

## 데이터 ---------
refinery <- "https://web.archive.org/web/20110306111912/http://tonto.eia.doe.gov/dnav/pet/pet_pnp_pct_dc_nus_pct_m.htm" %>% 
  read_html() %>% 
    html_node(xpath="/html/body/table[2]") %>% 
    html_table(fill = TRUE)

refinery_df <- refinery %>% 
  select(X3, X6) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  slice(8:n()) %>% 
  set_names(c("product", "percentage")) %>% 
  mutate(percentage = as.numeric(percentage)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(percentage)) 

## 이모지 --------
### 참조: https://www.hvitfeldt.me/blog/real-emojis-in-ggplot2/

emoji_chr <- c("car", "fuel", "airplane", "truck", rep("boom", 4))

link_to_img <- function(x, size = 25) {
  paste0("<img src='", x, "' width='", size, "'/>")
}

emoji_to_link <- function(x) {
  paste0("https://emojipedia.org/emoji/",x) %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_nodes("tr td a") %>%
    .[1] %>%
    html_attr("href") %>%
    paste0("https://emojipedia.org/", .) %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_node('div[class="vendor-image"] img') %>%
    html_attr("src")
}

emojis <- map_chr(emoji_chr, ~emo::ji(.))

emoji_df <- tibble(emoji = emojis) %>% 
  mutate(url = map_chr(emoji, slowly(~emoji_to_link(.x), rate_delay(1))),
         label = link_to_img(url))
 

refinery_df %>% 
  mutate(index = 1:n()) %>% 
  mutate(prod_group = ifelse(index >= 8, "etc", product)) %>% 
  group_by(prod_group) %>% 
  summarise(percentage = sum(percentage)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange( desc(percentage)) %>% 
  bind_cols(emoji_df) %>% 
  mutate(prod_group = fct_reorder(prod_group, percentage)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=prod_group, y=percentage, label = label)) +
    geom_col(width=0.1, color="gray") +
    geom_point() +
    coord_flip() +
    labs(x="", y="") +
    theme_bw() +
    geom_richtext(aes(y = percentage), fill = NA, label.color = NA, 
                label.padding = grid::unit(rep(0, 4), "pt") 
  ) 
```
